title: Wheel Of Destiny 2018 Edition!
itunes:title: Wheel Of Destiny 2018 Edition!
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling & Colleen Wolfe - check in on the latest news from around the league, including training camp holdouts (4:50); Andrew Luck is throwing a football, just not *the* football (8:26); Reggie Bush wins lawsuit against Rams for ‘concrete ring of death’ injury (13:30); And Panthers defensive lineman calls out NFL.com’s Gregg Rosenthal for his ranking of Carolina’s defense (19:35). The heroes then revisit a fan-favorite (?) segment- The Wheel Of Destiny! (22:00)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
